page.title: 11Parents Hobbies 1.
page.content: Dad's hobby is motor bikes. Ever since he was a little boy he has liked them.When he was sixteen he learned to ride one and he has been riding one for twenty years. His passion began as a hobby but he has now become a qualified instructor for Warwickshire County Council. He also has a business buying,selling making and repairing motor bikes. He enjoys being in the motor cycle business. He loves training new motor cyclists because he thinks people should learn to ride motor bikes properly so that there is no danger to their life. Mum's hobby is reading, she likes fiction to help her relax and non-fiction because she likes to learn new things.Mum also likes writing poetry as she finds it relaxing and helps her memorize events.
